org.dellroad.muxable.simple

Class LoggingSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dellroad.muxable.simple.LoggingSupport
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChannelIds, ProtocolReader, ProtocolWriter

    public class LoggingSupport
extends Object
    Debug logging support class.

      • log

        protected final Logger log

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoggingSupport

        public LoggingSupport()
        Default constructor.

        Uses the Logger returned by LoggerFactory.getLogger() and the log prefix returned by LogginSupport.simpleLogPrefix(), when given this instance.

      • LoggingSupport

        public LoggingSupport(Object obj)
        Constructor.

        Uses the Logger returned by LoggerFactory.getLogger() and the log prefix returned by LogginSupport.simpleLogPrefix(), when given the specified object.

        Parameters:
        obj - object about which to log
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if obj is null

      • LoggingSupport

        public LoggingSupport(Logger log,
                      String logPrefix)
        Primary constructor.
        Parameters:
        log - Logger to use
        logPrefix - prefix for all log messages, or null for empty string
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if log is null

    • Method Detail

      • simpleLogPrefix

        public static String simpleLogPrefix(Object obj)
        Build a simple log message prefix based on the given object.

        The implementation in LoggingSupport returns a prefix containing the given instance's class' simple name and its System.identityHashCode(java.lang.Object).

        Parameters:
        obj - object about which to log
        Returns:
        default log prefix
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if obj is null

      • trace

        protected void trace(String format,
                     Object... args)
        Log at trace level (if enabled).
        Parameters:
        format - format string for String.format()
        args - format string arguments

      • toString

        protected String toString(ByteBuffer data,
                          int maxBytes)
        Produce a debug-loggable String version of the given ByteBuffer.

        Examples: "[0123456789abcdef0123456789abcdef]", "[0123456789abcdef...8 more]"

        Parameters:
        data - byte buffer
        maxBytes - maximum number of bytes to decode
        Returns:
        initial bytes in data, or "null" of data is null
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if maxBytes is negative

      • formatLog

        protected String formatLog(String format,
                           Object... args)
        Format a log message.

        The implementation in LoggingSupport delegates to String.format() and adds logPrefix as a prefix.

        Parameters:
        format - String.format() format string
        args - String.format() format arguments
        Returns:
        formatted log message
